synopsis.text: Tenjou Yuuya, a high school student, has always been a target of bullying and neglect, with his parents showing him no love. The only person who ever cared for him, his grandfather, passes away, leaving Yuuya a mysterious house in his will. Forced to move out by his parents, Yuuya discovers a hidden door in his new home that leads to an alternate world filled with magic and monsters. In this new realm, Yuuya gains access to extraordinary abilities, weapons, and resources, allowing him to grow stronger than he ever thought possible. As he returns to his own world, he finds that his appearance and abilities have transformed, giving him the chance to turn his life around and seek the justice he's always deserved. With his newfound power, Yuuya embarks on a journey to uncover his true potential and redefine his destiny.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
